title: Leaf Space scales support for multi-satellite rideshare missions
description:
Berlin, Germany (SPX) Dec 03, 2025


Leaf Space is providing ground segment services for 31 satellites on a single upcoming SpaceX rideshare mission, the largest number of spacecraft it has supported on one launch to date and representing about 30 percent of …
